author: cnbc.com
title: ASGN Incorporated Schedules First Quarter 2018 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
CALABASAS, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- ASGN Incorporated (NYSE: ASGN) announced today that it expects to release its first quarter 2018 financial results on Wednesday, April 25, 2018 at approximately 4:15 p.m. EDT to be followed by its regular quarterly conference call later that day at 5:00 p.m. EDT. The Company’s prepared remarks will be posted to its website prior to the call.
The dial-in number for this conference call is 800-230-1085 (+1-612-234-9959 outside the United States). Please reference Conference ID number 447114. The call will be hosted by Peter Dameris, Chief Executive Officer of ASGN.
A replay of the conference call will be available from 7:00 p.m. EDT on April 25, 2018 until midnight on May 9, 2018. The dial-in number for the replay is 800-475-6701 (+1-320-365-3844 outside the United States). The replay access code is 447114. This call is being webcast by CCBN and can be accessed through our website at www.asgn.com .
About ASGN
ASGN Incorporated (NYSE: ASGN), formerly known as On Assignment, Inc., is one of the foremost providers of IT and professional services in the technology, creative/digital, engineering, life sciences and government sectors. Our mission as an organization is to be the premier provider of highly skilled human capital targeting critical STEM skill sets that will drive the economy in the years ahead. Through an integrated suite of professional staffing and IT solutions, ASGN improves productivity and utilization among leading corporate enterprises and government organizations.
Due to our companies’ achievements, we are viewed as best in class across multiple industries and have built an outstanding reputation of excellence over the past 33 years.
ASGN is based in Calabasas, California, and has over 156 branch offices across the United States, Canada and Europe. For more information, visit us at www.asgn.com .
